summary: The filing is expected to become effective after the SEC completes its review process, subject to market and other conditions.
title: Celsius Network Files Draft S-1 Form to Take Its Mining Unit Public
content: Crypto lender Celsius Network said its mining unit has recently filed a confidential S-1 draft registration with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).
Read more: Crypto Lender Celsius Says Its CEL Token Faces ‘Regulatory Risks’

entity.type: Crypto Lender Celsius Says Its CEL Token Faces ‘Regulatory Risks’
